title: Inauthentic profile scale metrics (reported)
summary: Third-party analysis reports inauthentic profile counts and ratios for Venezuela-related influence activity. Summit IO ingests the figures as structured evidence for provenance and auditability.
findings: Public reporting cites thousands of inauthentic profiles within the analyzed dataset.
Reported narrative framing shifted from normalizing intervention to describing the capture as illegal kidnapping.
limitations: Source dataset methods are Deferred pending direct report appendix ingestion.
